data.question: What are the two homochiral organocatalytic MOMs prepared using?
What property did ocMOM-1 exhibit in the context of transfer hydrogenation?
data.answer: Improved enantioselectivity over the parent ligand

data.question: What is the crystal system and space group of ocMOM-1?
What is the significance of the hea net topology found in ocMOM-1?
data.answer: It represents the first hea net in the field of MOMs

data.question: True or False: ocMOM-2 exhibits a new 4,8 connected network with topological point symbol of {410(cid:3)616(cid:3)82}{45(cid:3)6}2.

data.answer: The relatively open nature of the chiral environment
